google_api_key.info: Your Google API key for accessing the Custom Search API.

google_cse_id.info: Your Google Custom Search Engine ID.

k.info: The number of search results to return.

success.search_completed: Search completed successfully. Found {count} results for '{query}'

warnings.empty_query: Search query is empty. Please provide a search term.
warnings.no_results: No search results found for query: '{query}'

errors.import_error: Missing required dependency. Please install langchain-google-community to use Google Search API.
errors.langchain_google_missing: Please install langchain-google-community to use GoogleSearchAPIWrapper.
errors.tool_creation_failed: Failed to create Google Search tool: {error}
errors.wrapper_creation_failed: Failed to create Google Search wrapper: {error}
